text:
Oliver Eaton Williamson (September 27, 1932 – May 21, 2020) an American economist. He was a professor at the University of California, Berkeley. He was a laureate of the 2009 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences.
Williamson died on May 21, 2020 in Oakland, California of pneumonia-related problems at the age of 87.

annotations.surface_form: Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences
